bug.short_desc: [1.8][compiler] TypeVariableBinding cannot be cast to ArrayBinding

long_desc.thetext: Stephan, thanks for taking a look,

While descending into inner invocations, I was still using the inferenceKind of the outer inference, hence we believed to work on a varargs invocation, while the inner actually is fix-arity.
Fixed by retrieving the inner inferenceKind from the associated inner inference context, if any.
Released via http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?h=BETA_JAVA8&id=98016f2ec4015d0dc1722d20dcbe6f3ffef66bb4
*** Bug 427567 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

The bug is a duplicate of the original Bug 427567.
Common Call Stack: org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.lookup.ArrayBinding at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.lookup.InferenceContext18.varArgTypes(InferenceContext18.java:1076)
and error message: java.lang.ClassCastException.
Verified as working for Eclipse + Java 8 RC1 Eclipse Kepler 4.3.2(RC4) Build id: M20140212-0800 + Eclipse Java Development Tools Patch for Java 8 Support (BETA) 1.0.0.v20140220-2054.
